values:
i'm super sick.
my mom made me eat today.
and i have practice at the asscrack of dawn tomorrow lol

but i'm so glad it's the weekend for obvious reasons but also because:
tomorrow i'll eat a small breakfast, a bar during practice, and then only liquids for the rest of the day[which may change for reasons i will not post publicly] 

AND

also because sunday is my day off and THAT is DETOX DAYYYYY!!!!
no way THAT'S not happenning.
but i'm going to sleep right now because i am exhausted and drained so i'll tty guys later!
wish me luck!

nadia
http://nadzzia45.livejournal.com/3069.html

haven't done too well[for me] since my last post. today though i had some oatmeal cereal before practice, a bar during practice, and then 2 asian pears, a pear, soymilk, and a lot of water throughout the day. it's almost 6:20pm right now and there's no way i'm going to slip tonight. 
tomorrow i'm doing the same thing but only liquids after practice.
right now i'm working out my disgusting abs.
 
i think i'm finally doing it.

i can't WAIT to lose the weight!!!!

nadia
http://nadzzia45.livejournal.com/2596.html

honestly don't really want to talk about how i did today. from a realistic point of view, i did well. from my point of view or anyone else who's a MUCH BETTER deiter than me's point of view, i did NOT do well. so that's all i'm going to say. tomorrow i'm going to a banquet and my mom ordered me fish. healthy, but i'm not going to eat much of it and am planning on not having anything before or after that. ugh 

i'll let you know how that went later.
http://nadzzia45.livejournal.com/2442.html

ok so i've had soymilk, a banana and a fatfree powerbar today because of practice. only allowing myself soymilk for the rest of the day. i really messed up my left shoulder at practice yesterday and i'm going to see what's wrong with it later today. don't know if i can do anything at practice tomorrow which sucks.. but at the same time would be good so i didn't have to eat anything for energy. we'll see what happens.
http://nadzzia45.livejournal.com/2078.html

god i hope tomorrow will be an easy day at practice because i am planning on completely fasting all day. and if i have to waste a lot of energy tomorrow i'll have to eat my bar:[[

and it better happen tomorrow because saturday practices are always long and hard so i know i can't continue the fast then:[
http://nadzzia45.livejournal.com/1824.html

ok so today so far i've had a fatfree powerbar, propel, crappy tasting healthy cereal[hence the healthy lol], some almonds, a pear.. yeah i won't even go on. a small part of me knows i've lost weight like everyone says, and that i exercise a lot and everything i eat is very healthy but that's a tiny part of me. the rest knows that's way too much, i probably haven't lost anything, and that i'm doing terribly. that small part of me also knows that if i keep going the way i have been for the past couple of months i'll be a lot closer to the 'skinny' i want to be, in about another month, give or take. but i wish it came faster and i still want to be so much skinnier than what even eating riduclously healthy will ever let me be.

ugh i'm in a rut.
let's fast forward time.
http://nadzzia45.livejournal.com/1772.html

so i ate a lot[for me] today. my mom made me food and watched me eat it. it was all really healthy but that obviously doesn't make it ok since i felt fat all day from not feeling hungry. on top of that my mom is mad at me for who knows what right now and idk. i just didn't have a fantastic day.
tomorrow, i better not slip.

ugh hopefully tomorrow will be a better day..


nadia
http://nadzzia45.livejournal.com/1392.html

ok so i did exactly what i said i would do today. all i had after 11am was organic soymilk, grapes, and a hoodia lollipop. i'm feeling fat right now cuz i'm not hungry from the hoodia, but i know i did well.
and this is only the first day!
i can't wait to see what happens in 2 or 3 weeks!!

good lucky to everyone else! 

nadia
http://nadzzia45.livejournal.com/1267.html

helloooo everyone.
so i've always restricted myself but i've been on a really strict diet for about 2 months now but today is the first day of my dietdiet.
since i swim so much i know i need energy for that, so i'm allowing myself a small breakfast before practice and a bar during practice. after that i can have some fruit or organic/light soymilk but only that for the rest of the day.
I CAN'T SLIP!! i've slipped WAY too many times and it is NOT going to happen again!!

motivate me!
http://nadzzia45.livejournal.com/817.html

ok so it's my first time writing in my journal today. i used to have one but stopped it a couple of years back. anyway getting to the point- i'm so frustrated with myself!! i tell myself i'm going to fast food and only have water and maybe some organic soymilk all day, and then i binge at the very end of the day. ugh this ALWAYS happens!!! even though i binge really healthy food and i'm losing, i'm not losing fast enough. i need way more support so feel free to add me!!!!

nadia
http://nadzzia45.livejournal.com/675.html
